about.notification: This section is made in order to make known the type of person that you will use or consider.
about.name: Full name: Alexis Leonel Praiz
about.hobbie-text: Studying new programming concepts, practice Piano, study English, read and interpret other people's code through educational videos on YouTube, play videogames.
about.personality-text: Very dedicated and dutiful, responsible, patient, kind, good relationship with colleagues, introverted, productive, I always seek to progress on a personal and professional level, in general I consider myself quite competent although sometimes I get the famous 'impostor syndrome' but I don't I let myself win
